#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{int col,row,l=0,i,j,l1;string str;
while(cin>>col)
{if(col==0)break;
else
{cin>>str;
l=str.length();
row=l/col;l1=0;
char ch[row][col];
for(i=0;i<row;i++)
{if((i&1)!=0){for(j=col-1;j>=0;j--){ch[i][j]=str[l1];l1++;}}
else{for(j=0;j<col;j++){ch[i][j]=str[l1];l1++;}}
}
for(j=0;j<col;j++)
for(i=0;i<row;i++)
cout<<ch[i][j];
cout<<"\n";
}}}
